bio: Aww, don't you wanna give him a great big hug? Don't be fooled, this little guy is a felon and Mass Mutterer's partner in crime!

soultimate.name: Self-Destruct
soultimate.description: Hit nearby foes, allies, and self with lots of damage.

skill.effect: Placed traps will not hit allies.
skill.name: Handmade Bombs

name: Sam
